alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 1:32AM MST until January 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST MONDAY ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Lighter snow accumulations possible down to 5000 feet. Winds gusting to 25-30 mph at times. * WHERE...Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County
